languages.text: "Звездорожденный, что несет на себе печать потомка Кетца Темера, силен волей и телом — как и положено богу. Этот слуга, как и прочие спутники его, обессилили уже на седьмую ночь. Но Звездорожденный бесстрашно вел нас вперед, выслеживая даже средь спутанных троп духов-из-тьмы и верша кару небес!"

traits.locale_text: "Звездорожденный, что несет на себе печать потомка Кетца Темера, силен волей и телом — как и положено богу. Этот слуга, как и прочие спутники его, обессилили уже на седьмую ночь. Но Звездорожденный бесстрашно вел нас вперед, выслеживая даже средь спутанных троп духов-из-тьмы и верша кару небес!"

languages.text: "The Starborn who carries the seal of Quetza Temer's descendant is strong in both body and will — as befits a god. This servant, like the rest of his entourage, had grown weak on just the seventh night of our journey. But the Starborn continued to lead us fearlessly, pressing forward to seek out the spirits-from-the-darkness even among the twisted paths, delivering the sky's judgement!"
languages.original_text: "Звездорожденный, что несет на себе печать потомка Кетца Темера, силен волей и телом — как и положено богу. Этот слуга, как и прочие спутники его, обессилили уже на седьмую ночь. Но Звездорожденный бесстрашно вел нас вперед, выслеживая даже средь спутанных троп духов-из-тьмы и верша кару небес!"

traits.locale_text: "The Starborn who carries the seal of the Quetza Temer's descendant in strong in both body and will — as befits a god. This servant, like the rest of his entourage, had grown week at just the seventh night of our journey. But the Starborn continued to fearlessly lead us, moving forward to seek out the spirits from the darkness even among the twisted paths and passing the sky's judgement!"

But the Starborn continued to fearlessly lead us, moving forward to seek out the spirits from the darkness even among the twisted paths and passing the sky's judgement!"

But the Starborn continued to lead us fearlessly, pressing forward to seek out the spirits-from-the-darkness even among the twisted paths, delivering the sky's judgement!"

"The Starborn who carries the seal of Quetza Temer's descendant is strong in both body and will — as befits a god. This servant, like the rest of his entourage, had grown weak on just the seventh night of our journey. But the Starborn continued to lead us fearlessly, pressing forward to seek out the spirits-from-the-darkness even among the twisted paths, delivering the sky's judgement!"

languages.text: «El Hijo de las Estrellas que porta el sello del descendiente de Quetza Temer es fuerte de cuerpo y espíritu, como corresponde a una deidad. Este siervo, como el resto de su séquito, comenzó a flaquear tras solo siete noches de viaje. ¡Pero el Hijo de las Estrellas continuó guiándonos sin temor alguno, avanzando para buscar a los espíritus de las tinieblas en los tortuosos senderos y para ejecutar el juicio del cielo!».
languages.original_text: "The Starborn who carries the seal of Quetza Temer's descendant is strong in both body and will — as befits a god. This servant, like the rest of his entourage, had grown weak on just the seventh night of our journey. But the Starborn continued to lead us fearlessly, pressing forward to seek out the spirits-from-the-darkness even among the twisted paths, delivering the sky's judgement!"

traits.locale_text: «El Hijo de las Estrellas que porta el sello del descendiente de Quetza Temer es fuerte de cuerpo y espíritu, como corresponde a una deidad. Este siervo, como el resto de su séquito, comenzó a flaquear tras solo siete noches de viaje. ¡Pero el Hijo de las Estrellas continuó guiándonos sin temor alguno, se adelantó para buscar a los espíritus de las tinieblas en los tortuosos senderos y superó el juicio del cielo!».

languages.text: “那位带着格扎尔特默后代印记的星裔，身体和意志都很强壮，就像神明一样。此仆人和他的其他随从一样，在旅行的第七个晚上就变得衰弱不堪，但星裔仍然无所畏惧，继续带领我们前进，寻找来自黑暗的精魂。哪怕是扭曲的道路，天空的审判，也无法阻挡他的脚步！”
languages.original_text: "The Starborn who carries the seal of Quetza Temer's descendant is strong in both body and will — as befits a god. This servant, like the rest of his entourage, had grown weak on just the seventh night of our journey. But the Starborn continued to lead us fearlessly, pressing forward to seek out the spirits-from-the-darkness even among the twisted paths, delivering the sky's judgement!"

traits.locale_text: “那位带着格扎尔特默后代印记的星裔，身体和意志都很强壮，就像神明一样。此仆人和他的其他随从一样，在旅行的第七个晚上就变得衰弱不堪，但星裔仍然继续无所畏惧地带领我们前进，寻找来自黑暗的精魂。哪怕是扭曲的道路，天空的审判，也无法阻挡他的脚步！”

languages.text: « Le Stellaire qui porte le sceau du descendant de Quetza Temer est fort de corps et d'esprit, comme il sied à un dieu. Ce serviteur, tout comme l'entourage du Stellaire, s'est affaibli dès la septième nuit de notre périple. Pourtant, il a continué à nous mener sans crainte, traquant les esprits des ténèbres malgré les chemins tortueux pour leur infliger le châtiment du ciel ! »
languages.original_text: "The Starborn who carries the seal of Quetza Temer's descendant is strong in both body and will — as befits a god. This servant, like the rest of his entourage, had grown weak on just the seventh night of our journey. But the Starborn continued to lead us fearlessly, pressing forward to seek out the spirits-from-the-darkness even among the twisted paths, delivering the sky's judgement!"

traits.locale_text: « Le Stellaire qui porte le sceau du descendant de Quetza Temer est fort de corps et d'esprit, comme il sied à un dieu. Ce serviteur, tout comme l'entourage du Stellaire, s'est affaibli dès la septième nuit de notre périple. Pourtant, il a continué à nous mener sans crainte, traquant les esprits des ténèbres malgré les chemins tortueux pour leur infliger le châtiment du ciel ! »

languages.text: 「ケツァ・テメルの末裔の印を持つスターボーンは、肉体も意志も強靭だ…神にふさわしく。このしもべも、他の従者たちと同様、旅の7日目の夜に衰弱してしまった。しかし、スターボーンは恐れを知らぬまま私たちを導き続け、ねじれた道の中でも闇から精霊を探し出すために前進し、空の審判を下したのだ！」
languages.original_text: "The Starborn who carries the seal of Quetza Temer's descendant is strong in both body and will — as befits a god. This servant, like the rest of his entourage, had grown weak on just the seventh night of our journey. But the Starborn continued to lead us fearlessly, pressing forward to seek out the spirits-from-the-darkness even among the twisted paths, delivering the sky's judgement!"

traits.locale_text: 「ケツァ・テメルの末裔の印を持つスターボーンは、肉体も意志も強靭だ…神にふさわしく。このしもべも、他の従者たちと同様、旅の7日目の夜に衰弱してしまった。しかし、スターボーンは恐れを知らぬまま私たちを導き続け、ねじれた道の中でも闇から精霊を探し出すために前進し、空の審判を下したのだ！」

languages.text: "Der Sternengeborene, der das Siegel des Nachfahren von Quetza Temer trägt, hat einen starken Körper und einen starken Geist, wie es sich für eine Gottheit gehört. Diesen Diener haben schon in der siebten Nacht unserer Reise die Kräfte verlassen, genau wie den Rest des Gefolges. Doch der Sternengeborene führte uns weiter furchtlos an, marschierte voran, um die Geister-der-Dunkelheit zu finden, so verschlungen der Pfad auch sein mochte, und um das Urteil des Himmels zu vollstrecken!"
languages.original_text: "The Starborn who carries the seal of Quetza Temer's descendant is strong in both body and will — as befits a god. This servant, like the rest of his entourage, had grown weak on just the seventh night of our journey. But the Starborn continued to lead us fearlessly, pressing forward to seek out the spirits-from-the-darkness even among the twisted paths, delivering the sky's judgement!"
